title: Chair Seat Cover, 1900–1953
medium:
Medium: wool on linen warp
Technique: tapestry weave
description: Panel of stylized flowers, curving stems and long-lobed leaves in soft shades of pink, grey-blue, yellow, green, and tan on a black ground. Woven sideways, with hatching, interlocking, and slits sewn together. Designer's or studio's cipher in upper right-hand corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chair Seat Cover, 1900–1953.Medium: wool on linen warp
Technique: tapestry weave. 1953-90-22.
